description:
From their law office in Leesburg, Virginia, the attorneys at Beckman, Schmalzle, Georgelas & Ross provide unmatched counsel and advocacy for a diverse range of clients throughout their area who have legal needs involving any of the following:

  • Family Law
  • Personal Injury
  • Wills and Trusts
  • Civil Litigation
  • Criminal Law

Adhering to their core belief that people matter and everyone deserves quality, professional legal counsel, the firm's lawyers promise to treat you with the same care and respect they would a member of their own family as they work hard to help you achieve your goals and the favorable outcomes you expect and deserve as efficiently and cost-effectively as possible.

Honored for their success, BSGR lawyers have earned consistent top rankings and endorsements. All four partners have been designated as a Super Lawyer or Super Lawyer Rising Star from 2016 to 2020. They have also earned Top 40 Under 40 rankings from The National Trial Lawyers Association, and the 10 Best in Client Satisfaction Award from the American Institute of Criminal Defense Attorneys, as well as the American Institute of Family Law Attorneys. BSGR attorneys have also received many testimonials and referrals from those they have served.

With an additional law office in Frederick, Maryland, Beckman, Schmalzle, Georgelas & Ross has become one of their region's premier full-service legal practice for individuals and families in need. To find out how they can best assist you with your legal matter, you can contact their office to schedule an initial consultation. They also currently offer virtual consultations to help keep you safe and healthy in these uncertain times.
